main event: A witness in Lafayette, Indiana observed a green and white object with a green glow zigzagging in the sky on May 27, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as zigzagging in a jerky flight pattern., The sighting lasted for about 1 hour., The object disappeared occasionally to the south., It was reported as similar to a previous sighting., The report suggests that the object could not be explained by the observer.
sighted object: a green and white object emitting a green glow
